text.section: All fees received by the board and collected under this chapter or the administrative regulations adopted in accordance with this chapter shall be deposited with the State Treasurer and credited to the revolving fund of the board, a trust and agency fund, to be used by the board in defraying the costs and expenses of the board in the administration of the provisions of this chapter. No part of this fund shall revert to the general fund of the Commonwealth.
The board may employ an executive director and other personnel and may purchase such materials and supplies as it may deem necessary for the proper discharge of its duties.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 9, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 8. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 27, sec. 8, effective June 19, 1958.
